channel.title: Configurations on HodDB
channel.description: Recent content in Configurations on HodDB

item.title: Configuration
item.description: HodDB is configured with a YAML file. By default, this file is called hodconfig.yml and is loaded from the current directory, though this can be changed with the --config/-c command line option when executing the hod binary. Configuration defaults are as follows; there’s usually no reason to change these aside from the network configuration. ### HodDB Configuration # commented out lines are default configuration options #### # Location and structure of database #### # the location of the database files #DBPath: _hoddb # the path to the TTL file containing Brick relationships #BrickFrameTTL: "$GOPATH/src/github.
